jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{custCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mgCustCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{custName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sex, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{age, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{certType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{certNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{certNoNew, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{validat, jdbcType = DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{mobilePhone, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{homePhone, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{busPhone, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, TO_DATE(#{item.openDate, jdbcType = DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{marriedStatus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{educationStatus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{homeAddr, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{homePostCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{addr, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{postCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{busAddr, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{contTime, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{bornDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{item.lunarcal, jdbcType = DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{nation, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{country, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{originPlace, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{branch, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{subBranch, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{isEmp, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{satis, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{company, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{workPost, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{profession, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{dutie, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{compant, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{indType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{yearIncome, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{item.workAge, jdbcType = DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{custMan, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{isDisturb, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{isCreditCard, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{dDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO SP_APS_IFS_CUST_INFO ( APP_ID,CUSTID,CUSTCODE,MGCUSTCODE,CUSTNAME,SEX,AGE,CERTTYPE,CERTNO,CERTNONEW,VALIDAT,MOBILEPHONE,PHONE, HOMEPHONE,BUSPHONE,OPENDATE,MARRIEDSTATUS,EDUCATIONSTATUS,HOMEADDR,HOMEPOSTCODE,ADDR,OPOSTCODE,BUSADDR, BUSPOSTCODE,FAX,EMAILADDR,PREINVST,BLOODTYPE,RELBELIEF,CONTTIME,BORNDATE,LUNARCAL,NATION,COUNTRY,ORIGINPLACE, BRANCH,SUBBRANCH,ISEMP,SATIS,COMPANY,WORKPOST,PROFESSION,DUTIE,COMPNAT,INDTYPE,YEARINCOME,WORKAGE,CUSTMAN, STATUS,IS_DISTURB,IS_CREDIT_CARD,D_DATE )
SELECT #{item.appId, jdbcType = CHAR}, #{item.custId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.custCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.mgCustCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.custName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.sex, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.age, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{item.certType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.certNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.certNoNew, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{item.validat, jdbcType = DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{item.mobilePhone, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.phone, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.homePhone, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.busPhone, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, TO_DATE(#{item.openDate, jdbcType = DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{item.marriedStatus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.educationStatus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.homeAddr, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.homePostCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.addr, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.postCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.busAddr, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.busPostCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.fax, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.emailAddr, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.preinvst, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.bloodType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.relBelief, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.originPlace, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.branch, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.subBranch, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.isEmp, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.satis, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.company, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.workPost, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.profession, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.dutie, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.compant, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.isDisturb, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.isCreditCard, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{item.dDate, jdbcType = DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM DUAL
